headline: Cigna Disaster Drug Donations Tie Evernorth Capabilities To Undervalued Story
summary: Cigna Group's Evernorth unit has partnered with humanitarian group Direct Relief on a new prescription medication donation pathway. The program is designed to source and distribute surplus prescription drugs to support disaster and emergency response efforts. The collaboration creates a framework for humanitarian organizations to obtain prescriptions directly from participating pharmacies. Cigna Group (NYSE:CI), through its Evernorth health services segment, is tying its healthcare...
